data.text:
Nothing works, not even speaking a decent English to the guy at the reception.
Aircon is either on or off, no way you can use the thermostat. Bathroom smells like sewer. 
Breakfast: there are no cups for coffee.
Good luck with meals overall.
Itâ€™s cheap. Thatâ€™s what you get.
Here and there you find nice personnel, like Mahmoud at that pool bar, but heâ€™s an exception.
This resort really sucks.
Donâ€™t go unless youâ€™re on a budget like I was in that case.
data.title: Terrible

data.text:
The staff were friendly and helpful,
The room was spacious with comfy beds and basic amenities ...
The food buffet was good with many live cooking stations and friendly chefs...
The location is about 2.5 km away from the old market...
The only downside is the lack of free wifi in the rooms...
data.title: Good hotel

data.text:
Basically this hotel is useless , first :
 *  food is 1/10 
*  They gave us 1 Towel and we were 2 guests in a Double room which is WEIRD 
* we call the reception more than 5 time in 3 hours to get us Towels and they didnâ€™t !! 
* Room is very Dirty

data.title: A Nightmare in Tivoli Aqua Park

data.text:
Bad experience ever
Bad food
Unpro staff all over the hotel
Old rooms with dirtiness overloaded
I dnt recommend it at all
Plus its location is like u r in the desert 
It s 2 stars hotel maximum 
We really regret our stay at this location
But hamdulla we are leaving tomorrow
data.title: Bad experience ever/2**hotel not more

data.text: The staff are very friendly, nice and helpful. The beach is very clean and really beautiful. Everything was really good except for food which needs improvement. They have a big swimming pool with bar, Jacuzzi, and another waterpark. The rooms are spacious.
data.title: The staff are very friendly, nice and helpful. The beach is very clean and really beautiful. Everything was really good
